website_summaries.verdict: Whether allergies or hay fever cause misery, take one dose for 24 hours of symptom-free living – with the same formula as the prescription version.
pros: Coated tablets very easy to swallow
Those with skin conditions like hives take it with excellent results
Some users take half in a.m. and half in p.m. for even more relief

customer_reviews.title: My ENT gave me a tip to help it work even better and I'm not sure why it helped so much ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the only allergy medicine Ive found that doesn't make me feel drowsy and weird and actually works. My ENT gave me a tip to help it work even better and I'm not sure why it helped so much but he said to take a 180mg tablet and split it in half.. take one half in the AM and the other half in the PM. This made this allergy medicine twice as effective when i dosed it this way for some reason. I hope this will help someone else who has allergies
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Golden

customer_reviews.title: These are almost like sugar pills. DOESNT WORK
customer_reviews.text: I take Allegra all the time. Allegra in itself is a great medicine. Highly recommended. However, I usually buy it at my local grocery store. Decided to buy this specific bottle on amazon. this batch is clearly defective. I feel no better. almost like they’re sugar pills. Even though Amazon prices are better, I think they sell a lot of counterfeit medicine. From now on, I will spend the extra money and make sure I buy these from a reputable in store source
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Cammarata

customer_reviews.title: Batch seems to be a dud.
customer_reviews.text: I use Allegra all the time, and this looked like a legit purchase, but whether because they were stored improperly prior to shipping, or something else, this particular bottle doesn't seem effective. My symptoms are as bad as if I wasn't taking anything, and they immediately improved when I used a different package bought directly from the local drugstore. I'm a little bit bummed because the price was right, but not if the product doesn't work. I will probably call the company to check the batch #.
customer_reviews.author: loveabull

customer_reviews.title: Works best for me- great for all allergies.  Doesn't bother my heart.
customer_reviews.text: This was the best allergy medicine for me. I am allergic to pretty much everything and this helped me the best of all the meds I tried. Body chemistry varies. This was the only one I found that really helped- and also didn't bother my heart (I have a heart arrhythmia).
customer_reviews.author: Steven C. Santoni

customer_reviews.title: Good drug, bad delivery system -- uncoated tablets are HUGE!
customer_reviews.text: Allegra works pretty well for me, but I strongly prefer the coated caplets to these tablets. These are way bigger than the coated caplets, and I find them very hard to get down. Because they're not coated, they taste bad as well. I bought them by accident thinking they were the coated ones and cannot wait to get through the bottle so I can switch back.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: These don't work like store-bought Allegra
customer_reviews.text: I take Allegra every day because they relieve headaches caused by histamine. But as soon as this bottle from Amazon arrived and I started taking them, the headaches came back. When I bought another pack from CVS like I usually do and took those, the headaches went away again. Even tried the Amazon Allegra one more time just to make sure I wasn't crazy, and sure enough the headaches came back again. Everything looks legit, they're not expired, and if it weren't for the other reviewers who said the same thing I would totally think I was crazy. So I'm just posting this in case someone else thinks they're crazy.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Works for eyes, not congestion!
customer_reviews.text: This product should say for eyes only! I have been an allergy sufferer as a child who needed shots weekly for dust most and pollen. Red itchy watery eyes-this will work amazingly. But for congestion and nose problems and itchy throat you need Claritin D!!!! That will save your life!!! Allegra- Stop false advertising use for all allergies and put eye relief please.
customer_reviews.author: GiGi

customer_reviews.title: Long time user of this effective med.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this brand for years, for year round allergies. It's effective in treating my allergies, minimizing post nasal drip, sneezing, coughing, watery itchy eyes. I have tried other brands, but Allegra is the only one that has been effective in treating my symptoms. Since we are all different, what works for one person may not work with the next. This one is the only one that made a different for me, improving my quality of life.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: 12% of people who take Allegra report vomiting. I'm one of them.
customer_reviews.text: Allergy Doc recommended I 'switch up' from Claritin to Allegra. Boy was this a mistake. Felt nauseated and miserable all evening and ultimately ended up vomiting 3 times. My husband suggested it could be the Allegra. A short search later we read vomiting it's the most-reported common side-effect. It might work for you, but this is definitely not for me.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha R.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I was so nervous to buy this because I know allergy pills don't mix with some medicines and can also make you drowsy. I take this before I go to sleep at night and it works wonders. I was using nasal spray 3 times per day because of my allergies and needed a new solution so I didn't ruin my nose and this is definitely it! Since taking this about 1 week ago, I've not been stuffed up at all. About 2 days into using it, I noticed a complete difference.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren MacShara

customer_reviews.title: Severe Allergies - No More!
customer_reviews.text: I had severe allergies. This year was the worst. In February I was going through a box of tissues a day! I decided to try this over the counter option and was blown away by the results. I am not drowsy, and have had no side-effects. I take 1 pill early in the morning every 24 hours and I am now reduced to about 4 sneezes per day. I have had a great March and April 2020 as a result of these miracle pills. Life changer!!!
customer_reviews.author: A Reader

customer_reviews.title: Once a day saves me!
customer_reviews.text: I have so many kinds of allergies:plants, pets and house dust so I always have running nose for 365 days. I didn’t like taking allergy meds because mostly make my nose super dry and feel drowsy sometimes. This one doesn’t! Also once once a day to take. This really saves my allergy and I’m so happy!
customer_reviews.author: Mayu Halgren

customer_reviews.title: This medication and other medications like it cause me to have heart palpitations- see comment.
customer_reviews.text: 3 to 4 months ago I stopped taking Allegra and other type of antihistamine. Allegra and antihistamine type medications was causing me to have heart palpitations. I did start taking an herb combination called "Sinus and Seasonal" by Leslabs-no side effects and my allergies are controlled. I take at least 2 teaspoons of local honey each morning..
customer_reviews.author: L. Charles

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't make me tired
customer_reviews.text: Ok, so not that long ago, Mark Walberg posted a picture of his back after his allergy test and said, "I am allergic to everything". This is probably the one area where I can confidently beat Mark Walberg. My entire back looked like a Lite Bright, the places that did not have welts were far fewer than the places that did. With that being said, these are the best allergy pills I've found. They were recommended by my allergist. No noticeable side effects as far as I can tell and they don't knock me out like other pills.
customer_reviews.author: HKG2222

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: The strength of this allergy medication works really great. This is a great price and a fast delivery is very important especially when you realize you are almost out. I use this product all year and has been recommended by my physician for my allergy problems. It is also great I only have to take this once a day and works for 24 hours. But you must check with your physician before you begin a new medication especially if you already take medication for other problems.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Best deal anywhere
customer_reviews.text: What can I say? I have horrible allergies and have to take allergy pills daily year round. Believe me it gets mighty expensive. This here is the best deal I have found so far and they are the best I have tried other than the prescription strength ones that are no longer made, but that is another story. Anyhoo, check Wallyworld and you will see you pay about the same price for less. Like I said it is the beat deal for allegra.
customer_reviews.author: Thinking_Outloud

customer_reviews.title: My life saver
customer_reviews.text: I am allergic to shell fish but I can't stay away from that. Sushi and shrimp are way to my soul, so I couldn't imagine a life without eating those. So I carry Allegra with me most of the time. If the reaction gets bad and severe, I will have one tablet and thats it. Same with seasonal allergy. This kept me going for a few years now. My mom has similar experience, she is been using these for 2 decades possibly. Forever and ever I will eat sushi + Allegra
customer_reviews.author: Kathi

customer_reviews.title: Excellent price and works for my allergies
customer_reviews.text: Does the job -- and amazon has the best price I can find. I have taken these daily since the 1990s, when my doctor said I'm basically allergic to this city and should stay on it once a day. Fexofenadine was very cheap by prescription for awhile, but then it went OTC, and the prices went wild. This is the best price I have found, and believe me, I've looked all over.
customer_reviews.author: Carla Martin-Wood

customer_reviews.title: Developed Allergies - this was my cure After 1 month of use
customer_reviews.text: I had a constant sore throat which was caused from Post nasal drip which just developed this year for me, saw an ENT specialist which put me on a antihistamine I tried Claritin at first which it didn't work for my body switched over to Allegra and now I'm cleared from that constant Ache. It does take a month of continual use before it starts to build up in your system to help relive my symptoms.
customer_reviews.author: gracie_gust

customer_reviews.title: These work great
customer_reviews.text: I've had worse seasonal allergies this year than ever (maybe it's a covid19 thing)...just kidding, I know better. Anyway, I'd been taking another brand that was cheaper, but only 10mg. I notice right away that I just wasn't getting the relief I needed. Then noticed these 25 mg tabs on Amazon and they did the trick. I should have paid more attention. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Animal lover

customer_reviews.title: Not effective antihistamine product
customer_reviews.text: This Allegra product was not effective like the others I have used. The rest of my post was declined by Amazon.

customer_reviews.title: great strength
customer_reviews.text: allegra seems to be the only allergy medicine that really works for me and this was a value. these pills aren't to big, easy to swallow and work. i live in florida and my nose always gets runny before a rainstorm. like i like to say "my nose knows when it's gonna rain." so i take these once my eye begin to itch and i'm golden. also non-drowsy which is great.
customer_reviews.author: Cyn's Workshop

customer_reviews.title: Glad it is on subscribe and save
customer_reviews.text: this has helped me greatly with this allergy season I did read a reviewer comment on their Dr. saying take 1/2 in morning the other half at night and it seems to work very well this way. Glad it is on subscribe and save.
customer_reviews.author: pam

customer_reviews.title: Bad for those with Premature Ventricular Contractions (PVCs)
customer_reviews.text: Took one pill and within a short while, my premature ventricular contractions (PVCs) flared up. I have had PVCs in the past but nothing recently. Could be coincidental, but I highly doubt it. Quick google search reveals scientific studies supporting that this medication may cause or worsen issues with heart rhythm. I strongly suggest avoiding this if you've had/have any such issues. IMHO this product should carry a related warning.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Florucci

customer_reviews.title: Go to value pack.
customer_reviews.text: Amazon had the best price for this value pack. Arrived quickly with my Prime...and a huge help for allergy season. Easy to swallow and doesnt make me drowsy which is a perk.
customer_reviews.author: candygirl71881

customer_reviews.title: The results are as I expected.
customer_reviews.text: The results are as I expected. I am happy this product is working for me. I thought that I would not have good results because Amazon was selling it, even better, is worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Manny.

customer_reviews.title: Good product. Been taking this to help with chemo ...

I will continue to buy it as needed.

customer_reviews.text: I love these pills!!! I have really bad allergies and I try everything to help. And nothing seems to help. Decided to give these a chance. And THEY WORK AMAZING!!!!!

customer_reviews.text: Allegra is a good prevention for allergy season. I use it year round. Seems to work better for when allergy season does hit

I had lost my smell for like a month, took allegra 2 days, the 3rd day I woke up and I finally could smell again and Allergy symptoms were gone :D

customer_reviews.title: Allergy is a great product for your sinus allergy.

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: There are a lot of allergy meds out there and you have to find the one that's right for you. I like this product simply because it works for me without the side effects such as drowsiness and i only need to take one a day. I would recommend this product.

customer_reviews.title: Allegra - Best Value Here
customer_reviews.text: I use Allegra, to me it seems to work the best. The pills are not to large are easy to swallow, and a better value than in a store. As far as flavor, I do not let them sit in my mouth. It is down the hatch, so no flavor.

customer_reviews.title: Easier to swallow than the generics
customer_reviews.text: I was taking the generic Allegra but had a hard time swallowing the pills. They must not be coated or something. So I switched to the brand name (this bottle), and it's much better. They're still slightly on the big side, but they go down so much easier than the generics. And they work great at managing my chronic hives (I take these every day, and my skin doesn't itch at all).

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me at all
customer_reviews.text: Been taking Zyrtec and I decided to buy this to try and see if it would work any better as I had heard good things. Stopped Zyrtec and took this and never felt worse with my allergies! Does not work!

customer_reviews.text: took three each time and i still had a very runny nose ... :)

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: These allergy pills are great,they always work. Good price. Local drugstores would charge a mint for them.

customer_reviews.title: Stopped my allergy headaches
customer_reviews.text: This is a miracle it stopped my allergy headaches that I was getting everyday while using loratadine
customer_reviews.author: Jay K.

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: This is the best deal I’ve seen for Allegra 24-hour. I’ve been taking it for years and usually end up buying generic brands to save money. But, with this deal, I was able to buy name brand. It took about a week to get, but it was completely worth the wait.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Side effects!
customer_reviews.text: Maybe Allegra is good for some people but for me, it did a bad reaction on a digestive system.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Klein

product_meta.title: Allegra Adult 24 Hour Allergy Relief 70-Count Long-Lasting Fast-Acting Antihistamine for Noticeable Relief from Indoor and Outdoor Allergy Symptoms
product_meta.description: Health and Personal Care. Inactive ingredients are colloidal silicon dioxide, croscarmellose sodium, hypromellose, iron oxide blends, magnesium stearate, microcrystalline cellulose, polyethylene glycol, povidone, pregelatinized starch, titanium dioxide
feature_bullets: INCLUDES: One (1) 70-count bottle of Allegra Adult Non-Drowsy Antihistamine Tablets for 24-Hour Allergy Relief
24-HOUR RELIEF: One pill is all you need for round-the-clock relief from your worst allergy symptoms
FAST-ACTING: Allegra 24-Hour Allergy starts working in one hour for fast relief from sneezing, runny nose, itchy and watery eyes, and itchy nose or throat
NON-DROWSY: Formulated with active ingredient fexofenadine, a non-drowsy antihistamine
INDOOR & OUTDOOR ALLERGIES: Use Allegra tablets for indoor and outdoor allergies, including seasonal allergies and pet allergies

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
